name: Gear Up Sports Academy
details: Dynamic full stack web application for a sports academy based on summer camp. Secure authentication system and user access. Conditional admin panel to handle different role. Secure database management system. Secure and easy payment process.

name: Disney Toy Bazar
details: Dynamic full stack web application on toys store. Use to add toys with proper information by registered user. Secure authentication system and user access. Secure database management system and nice responsive and also user friendly layout.

name: Secret Chef Recipe
details: Complete responsive single page web application. Available all chefs' information with their recipes. Secure user access to visit private route.
